p: The effect of systemic intraperitoneal administration of different doses of the PBFEO (100, 200, and 400 mg/kg) on the behavioral responses during the first (phase I) and the second phases (phase II) of the formalin test were calculated. In formalin test, morphine revealed antinociceptive effects in both phases I and phase II ( Figure 2) but PBFEO did not produce any antinociception effect compared with the control group.
